preferences.paragraph1_text: You are required to upgrade to macOS Catalina.  Your current OS version will no longer be supported.
preferences.paragraph2_text: If you do not complete the upgrade by the end date, your system will upgrade on next login.
preferences.paragraph3_text: The upgrade takes between 30-90 minutes to complete.  Please connect to power before beginning.
preferences.paragraph_title_text: A macOS update is required on your machine.
